inventorymanagement.service

Interface OAuthServiceInterface


  • public interface OAuthServiceInterface
    Service that validates User OAuth login and creates session for the same
    Author:
    manrajsingh

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      inventorymanagement.model.LoginResponseModel authenticate(java.security.Principal principal, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Method that validates if user is authenticated.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        inventorymanagement.model.LoginResponseModel authenticate(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                   throws inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException,
                                                          inti.ws.spring.exception.client.ForbiddenException,
                                                          inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException
        Method that validates if user is authenticated. If yes, it checks if user is new and adds to database if not already done.
        Parameters:
        principal - Principal Object that contains OAuth response from the OAuth provider
        session - HttpSession Session to set attributes with user details
        Returns:
        LoginResponseModel
        Throws:
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException - Thrown when user logs in with email not being of Practo
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.ForbiddenException - Thrown when no response is received from Google OAuth
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException - Thrown when details are missing from Google response
